Title: CDCFIB raises alarm over fake job adverts, agents
Summary: CDCFIB raises alarm over fake job adverts, agents . The Civil Defence, Correctional, Fire and Immigration Services Board (CDCFIB) has warned Nigerians to disregard false information .

Title: IGP reaffirms police commitment to electoral integrity
Summary: IGP reaffirms police commitment to electoral integrity . IGP Kayode Egbetokun has reaffirmed the Nigeria Police Force's unwavering commitment to neutrality .

Title: Centre moves to reverse Nigeria’s rising cancer deaths
Summary: A new non-profit cancer centre has launched an ambitious prevention campaign aimed at reversing the rising number of cancer-related deaths in Nigeria, estimated at over 70,000 annually . Registered in the United Kingdom, the Ngogbehei Cancer Center (NCC), known as the NCC, is registered in the UK .

Title: Nigerians hungry, not happy with Tinubu – Fayemi
Summary: Former Ekiti State Governor Kayode Fayemi has criticised President Bola Tinubu’s administration . Fayemi said many Nigerians are suffering under current economic conditions and are unlikely to support the government in the next general election .

Title: Over 120 flights disrupted by UK tech glitch
Summary: Scores of flights to and from UK airports were cancelled Wednesday due to a technical glitch . Air traffic control service: Over 120 flights disrupted by UK tech glitch .

Title: Trump says tariffs making the US ‘great & rich’ again
Summary: US President Donald Trump says sweeping tariffs he has imposed on nations around the world are making the country "great & rich again" Trump says tariffs making the US 'great and rich' again .

Title: Reps Committee probes alleged abandonment of Nigerian workers in CAR
Summary: Reps Committee probes alleged abandonment of Nigerian workers in CAR . House of Representatives Committee on China-Nigeria Parliamentary Relations has launched a comprehensive investigation . Nigerians in the Central African Republic allege abandonment and the seizure of their passports .

Title: Iran condemns ‘malicious’ US sanctions targeting oil trade
Summary: Iran condemns 'malicious' fresh US sanctions targeting a shipping empire controlled by the son of a top political advisor to the Islamic republic's supreme leader . Iran described as "malicious" fresh U.S. sanctions targeting the shipping empire .

Title: Former Barcelona midfielder in hospital after dog bit his genitals
Summary: Carles Perez was bitten on the genitals by a dog while walking his own dog in Thermi, a suburb of Thessaloniki, Greece . The former Barcelona midfielder was hospitalised in hospital after the incident .

Title: Photos: Oyakojo clinches National Bantamweight title with 35-second knockout
Summary: Oyakojo floors Williams in round two to claim national glory July 30, 2025: Boxing fans at the National Stadium in Surulere, Lagos, were treated to a spectacular show on Wednesday .

Title: Anambra ‎‎gov candidate condemns killing of 'Fish Magnet', demands justice ‎

Title: Ex-Gombe ADC gov candidate names self interim national party chair
Summary: The Gombe State Governorship Candidate of the African Democratic Congress during the 2023 general elections, Nafiu Bala, now the Interim National Chairman of the party . Title: Zelensky urges allies to push for 'regime change' in Russia
Summary: Russian drone and missile attack on Kyiv killed seven people including a six-year-old boy . The strikes reduced part of a nine-storey apartment block in Kyiv’s western suburbs to rubble and wounded dozens of others . Title: Strong Demand, strategy drive Rolls-Royce's first-half profit to £4.4bn
Summary: The company reported a fourfold increase in first-half net profit to £4.4 billion ($5.8 billion) The sharp rise was attributed to rising sales and a significant accounting gain linked to weakening of the dollar . The group announced a dividend for the first half of the year, after reinstating shareholder payments last year .
